system.description: The Dark Eldar has mastered the art of inflicting precise, incapacitating wounds rather than lethal injuries.
system.benefit: Whenever the character deals Critical Damage to an opponent, they can make a +0 Intelligence Test. If they succeed, they can reduce the damage they inflict by up to their Intelligence Bonus and inflict 1 Fatigue on the Target for each degree of success they scored on the Test. They also gain +30 to Medicae Skill Tests to treat wounds that they caused.

rollConfig.description: Intelligence test when dealing Critical Damage to inflict Fatigue instead

specialAbilities.name: Incapacitating Strike
specialAbilities.description: When dealing Critical Damage, make an Intelligence test. If successful, reduce damage by up to your Intelligence Bonus and inflict 1 Fatigue per Degree of Success.
